comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13754?focusedCommentId=17437872) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Not doing this as in R, it the way this is done in R means it falls under pretty much the same as "matching a predicate" and the wording used here doesn't quite fit for R users.
